user.title: Dynamic scenes configuration
user.description:
Insert the update interval.

The update interval is the time in minutes between each update of the dynamic scenes.

no_ui_configuration_allowed.title: No UI configuration allowed
no_ui_configuration_allowed.description: This entry was created via `configuration.yaml`, so all configuration parameters must be updated there. The [`pyscript.reload`](developer-tools/service) service will allow you to apply the changes you make to `configuration.yaml` without restarting your Home Assistant instance.
